name: text-to-pdf
title: Text to PDF Converter
description: Convert plain text files to formatted PDF documents
content:
Overview

This application converts plain text files into professionally formatted PDF documents. Built using ReportLab, it creates clean, readable PDFs with proper margins and typography.

Features

  • Convert TXT files to formatted PDF
  • Professional typography and spacing
  • Preserves paragraph structure
  • Automatic page breaks
  • Clean, readable output
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your text file (.txt) from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the PDF output

Output

The application generates a PDF file with the same base name as your input file (e.g., notes.txt becomes notes.pdf). The PDF features professional formatting with proper margins, line spacing, and paragraph breaks.

Use Cases

  • Converting notes to printable format
  • Creating formatted documents from plain text
  • Archiving text files as PDFs
  • Preparing text for professional distribution
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/text_to_pdf.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
